translations: And has decreed your Lord that (do) not worship except
Him Alone and to the parents (be) good Whether reach
with you the old age one of them or both of them
then (do) not say to both of them a word of disrespect and (do) not
repel them but speak to them a word noble
puzzle.hint: This verse emphasizes two fundamental commands in Islam: the oneness of God and the importance of showing kindness to one's parents.
puzzle.arabic: ۞ وَقَضَىٰ رَبُّكَ أَلَّا تَعْبُدُوٓا۟ إِلَّآ إِيَّاهُ وَبِٱلْوَٰلِدَيْنِ إِحْسَـٰنًا ۚ إِمَّا يَبْلُغَنَّ عِندَكَ ٱلْكِبَرَ أَحَدُهُمَآ أَوْ كِلَاهُمَا فَلَا تَقُل لَّهُمَآ أُفٍّۢ وَلَا تَنْهَرْهُمَا وَقُل لَّهُمَا قَوْلًۭا كَرِيمًۭا
puzzle.verseEn: And your Lord has decreed that you worship not except Him, and to parents, good treatment. Whether one or both of them reach old age [while] with you, say not to them [so much as], "uff," and do not repel them but speak to them a noble word.
